name: DIRECTOR
description:
11/14/2015 Update

-Fixed climbable walls

-Added level restart key (R)

Director is a puzzle game where you help Spark reach the end of each level by moving objects around in the world to manipulate his movement.

Planning ahead and micromanaging each object will be key for Spark to reach his goal!

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uSsvpXtU7Ig

Level restart key (R)

Features

-Simple mouse controles
-Unique mechanics
-Clean visuals

All Music done by Mark Sparling: https://soundcloud.com/sparling-soundworks

My contact information: arnoldb1995@gmail.com

Any and all feedback is welcome!
